alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a group of strong thunderstorms 15 miles north of Kim, or 36 miles south of North La Junta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pritchett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
